column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
is a group package with sudo and compilation software
is a version control system
is the main graphical user interface and window manager
is the graphical server
retrieves screen information for some scripts
allows querying information about windows
starts the graphical server
is the monospace font of LARBS
provides the sans and serif fonts for LARBS
is a UI for screen adjustment
for transparency and removing screen-tearing
allows your computer to access dos-like filesystems
allows management of FAT drives
is a minimal image viewer
can record and splice video and audio on the command line
is the only program on LARBS your girlfriend has ever heard of
serves as the system keyring
gives the dark GTK theme used in LARBS
provides a build of vim with the ability to copy and paste between other programs
is the screen lock
does exactly what it sounds like
appears in the top right corner and manages the wi-fi connection
is a terminal RSS client
is a package that gives the system unicode symbols and emojis used in the status bar and elsewhere.
allows accessing NTFS partitions
is the audio system (>inb4 bloat)
is an audio interface with ALSA
is a terminal audio control interface
is an intuitive ncurses audio controller
generates color schemes based on your wallpaper
is an Excel-like terminal spreadsheet manager
provides system usage information and displays processes
can take quick screenshots at your request
hides an inactive mouse
extracts rar's
unzips zips
parses URLs in the terminal allowing keyboard-based selection
manages vim plugins
is a terminal browser which can also view images
downloads sites and files on the command line
gives the special escape/super mappings of LARBS
provides window action utilities on the command line.
times out the screen if locked
can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link
is a terminal interface for watching YouTube videos without a browser
is a pdf viewer with vim-like bindings
gives zathura the ability to read .djvu files
allows mupdf pdf compatibility in zathura
manipulates .pdfs and gives .pdf previews in ranger
shows audio and video information and is used by ranger as well
manages and gives information about archives
can highlight code output
queues commands or files for download
